page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT (LAMPHEY)
page.content: The area around Lamphey provides little in the way of employment.the tourist industry does provide some seasonal employment such as servicing holiday flats and cottages.Apart from this the largest employment field is that of agriculture.There are a few shops in the area as well as some public houses,there is also a small but good quality hotel.Most of the inhabitants however have to leave the area each day to work.the largest numbers travel to the oil refinery and the C.E.G.B. power station,both of which are near Pembroke.A number of people are also employed in various jobs in the Pembroke area,these people are mainly white collar or professional people.
